div.p: Augustus Gregory to Secretary of State for the Colonies
MS Q429 outward letter copy book, pp. 103-4, A. C. Gregory papers, Dixson Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

Transcribed 23.12.92. To proof.
I also avail myself of this opportunity of forwarding to you a package of Botanical Specimens, collected during the voyage from Sydney, by Dr Mueller, the Botanist attatched to the Expedition. The corresponding descriptive manuscript being enclosed with them.
